name: html
template:
<html>
    <head>
        <meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'/>
        <meta http-equiv='refresh' content='0; url=http://{{payload.publicIPv4}}:1880/display?act=3' method='get'> 
    </head>
    <body>
       </body>
</html

name: Main html
template:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <style> {{{payload.style}}} </style>
    <script> {{{payload.script}}} </script>
    <script type="text/javascript"> {{{payload.scriptSocket}}} </script>
</head>
<body onload="wsConnect();" onunload="ws.disconnect();">
    {{{payload.menu}}} 
    {{{payload.list}}}
</body>
</html>

name: Web Socket scriptSocket

func:
var msg = {payload:msg.payload.replace(/['^']/g, "\"")};
return msg;
